intro.description: This cheatsheet guides you through the creation a comment.

item.title: Open a file
item.description: To create a comment it is necessary to have a file opened in an editor. Comments that are bound to lines of code can only be added to ".java" and ".xml" files. Comments for other files will be treated as "global" comments.

item.title: Add comment
item.description: Select a range of source code. Adding a comment can be accomplished in two ways. Press the "Add new comment" button in the "Comments Summary" view or use the following shortkey "CTRL+Shift++".

item.title: Insert content
item.description: After creating the comment, it will be shown in the "Comment Detail" view. Insert the required and optional data. Some data might be preset. The comment will be saved automatically when leaving the "Comment Detail" view.
